title: Instagram Appointment Setter - Virtual Assistant Position
job_overview:
Instagram Appointment Setter - Virtual Assistant Position
Company Overview
We are a growing Education business looking for a dedicated and results-driven VA to join our team as an Instagram Appointment Setter. This is a remote position perfect for motivated individuals in the Philippines who want to grow their career in digital marketing and sales.
We currently employ over 50 VAs and have VAs that have been working with us since we launched 7 years ago. 

We’ll provide plenty of growth opportunity to individuals that are go getters.
Position: Instagram Appointment Setter (Virtual Assistant)
Two potential schedules:
Schedule 1: 6am to 2 pm EST
Schedule 2: 2pm to 10 pm
 Employment Type: Full-time
Job Description
We are seeking an experienced Virtual Assistant to generate qualified leads and schedule appointments through Instagram outreach. You will be responsible for engaging with potential customers, building relationships, and converting prospects into scheduled appointments for our sales team.
Key Responsibilities
Lead Generation: Identify and research potential customers on Instagram using targeting criteria
Direct Outreach: Send personalized direct messages to prospects following proven scripts and strategies
Engagement: Respond to comments, story replies, and engage with followers to build relationships
Lead Qualification: Ask qualifying questions to determine prospect fit and interest level
Appointment Setting: Schedule qualified appointments in our calendar system
CRM Management: Update prospect information and interaction history in our CRM
Follow-up: Nurture leads through follow-up messages and content engagement
Reporting: Provide daily/weekly reports on outreach activities and appointment metrics
Content Support: Assist with basic Instagram content engagement and community management
Required Qualifications
Experience: Minimum 1-2 years experience as a Virtual Assistant or in social media marketing
Instagram Expertise: Basic understanding of Instagram platform, features, and best practices
English Proficiency: Excellent written English communication skills (C1 level or higher)
Sales Skills: Basic understanding of sales processes and lead qualification
Technical Requirements:
Reliable high-speed internet connection (minimum 25 Mbps)
Modern computer/laptop with webcam
Quiet, professional workspace
Backup power source (UPS recommended)
Availability: Able to work EST
Preferred Qualifications (bonus)
Previous experience in appointment setting or lead generation
Experience with tools like GoHighLevel, or similar CRM platforms
Understanding of sales funnels and lead nurturing processes
Experience in appointment setting
Social media marketing certifications
Application Requirements
To apply, please submit:
Updated Resume/CV highlighting relevant VA and social media experience
Cover Letter explaining why you’d be a good fit
Keyword “purple pineapple” to know you read this
Portfolio/Examples of previous social media outreach or appointment setting work
Internet Speed Test screenshot showing your connection speed
About Working With Us

Our ideal candidate is someone who is proactive, detail-oriented, and excited about helping our business grow through strategic Instagram outreach.
